summary: This character-driven film considers the evolving sex trafficking landscape as seen by the main players: the exploited, the pimps, the johns that fuel the business, and the cops who fight to stop it.
cast: Danielle Douglas|Slim|Rain|T.R.|Nicholas Kristof|Daniel Steele|Franky Sessions|Brandy|Cindy|Allison Jennings|Hugh Loebner|Mitch Morrissey|Amelia Bunnell|Debbie The Real Glass Lady|Saul|Lucy|Robert Money|Jamie Chesman|Karen Hughes|Chris Baughman|Marc|Shera Bradley|Brooke Allen|Bryan Allen|Germaine Wallace|Joey Lensky|Deborah Lensky|Mary Bunnell
director: Directors: John Keith Wasson (as John-Keith Wasson), Jane Wells
title: Tricked: The Documentary
